tool_description: REST API custom made for Kenyan matatus  to help owners collect fares from passengers directly. With each user and owner having wallet, which is toped up using M-PESA
name: Metro Card
title: Metro Card

api_list.name: Owner – View Payments Per Car
Owner – All Withdraw
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metro-card.p.rapidapi.com/owner/all-withdraws"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metro-card.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
